Test Name: Glomerular Basement Membrane (GBM) Antibodies, IgG, Serum
Purpose: To detect IgG autoantibodies against the glomerular basement membrane for diagnosing autoimmune kidney diseases such as Goodpasture syndrome.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube
Equipment: ELISA kit, microtiter plate washer and reader, micropipettes, incubator
